name: プロデューサー
trans:
──────...
Huh, Nichika already went home...?

name: AD
text:
……？　ええ。今タクシーで……
七草さん、お帰りは別だって
trans:
...? Yeah. She caught a taxi just now...
Nanakusa-san said that you wouldn't be coming to 
pick her up today.

name: スマホ画面
text:
『にちか
もう家かな？』
trans: "Nichika, have you already made it home?"

name: 美琴
trans:
Daaa... Daaadaaa...
...──────

name: 美琴
text: ────やっぱり、ボーカルを重ねるのがいい
trans: ────Like I thought, layering the vocals is going to work best.

name: プロデューサー
text:
タクシー……って言ってたか
家じゃない、事務所にもレッスン場にも河原にもいない──
trans:
Actually, if she took a taxi... She wouldn't be going
home. And she's not at the office, or the lesson
room, or the riverbed either.

name: 美琴
trans: ────Upwards... upwards...

name: ルカ
text:
────んでだよ……！　ハァ……！？
なんでそうなるんだよ……！　勝手に決めんな…………！
trans:
────The hell...! Haaah...!?
Why the hell is this happening...!
Don't go deciding this shit without me...!

name: マネージャー
text:
……ルカ、ごめんね
その、大事な時期だし────
trans:
...I'm sorry, Luca. You must know how important this
time is for building you career───

name: プロデューサー
text:
────美琴も出ないな……
………………もしかして──────
trans:
────Mikoto isn't answering her phone either...
...Could it be that─────

name: 美琴
text:
……コンテンポラリーは
また次の機会でいいんじゃない
trans:
...I'm sure we'll have an opportunity to do
contemporary dance some other time.

name: ルカ
trans:
...Ugh.
Mikoto...

name: 美琴
text:
ちゃんと準備できないなら
あまり意味はないと思う
trans:
If there's not going to be time to prepare for it
properly, I don't think there's any meaning in still
trying to do it.

name: にちか
text:
…………
ここじゃ……なかったのかな…………
trans: ...I guess... She wasn't here after all...

name: にちか
trans: ...Huh, this door was left open...────

name: プロデューサー
text:
…………
なんの用だって、怒るだろうな
trans: ...If I ask what's going on, she'll get mad at me, I'm sure.

name: にちか
text: ………………美琴さん
trans: ...Mikoto-san.

name: 美琴
text: ……どうしたの？
trans: ...What's going on?

name: にちか
text:
と、突然来てしまって…………すみません…………！
あの、ノックしたら、ドアが開いていて……────
trans:
I-I apologize for coming by, so suddenly...!
I tried to knock, but the door opened on it's own...

name: 美琴
text:
……気付かなかった
換気をしていたの、入ったら？
trans:
...I didn't notice. I was testing the acoustics in here.
Come in, if you want?

name: にちか
text:
……れ、練習…………
しなきゃいけないんですけど…………こうしてる時間に
trans:
...I, uh... I should probably be practicing right now,
though... Instead of doing this.

name: 美琴
text:
……？
うん
trans:
...?
Yeah.

name: にちか
text:
わ、わかってるんです……すみません、美琴さんの練習の
お邪魔だし、合わせられるまでできてなくて、来ても、その
trans:
R-Right... Mikoto-san, I'm so sorry. All I do is interfere
with your practice, and I'm not even good enough at
the dance to do it with you yet. So I came to, um...

name: ルカ
text:
やめない、やる……！　絶対やる……
美琴と一緒に────────！
trans:
I'm not quitting now, I'm gonna do it...!
Just try and stop me...
Me and Mikoto, we're gonna do this together───!

name: ルカ
text:
美琴と私の、
最高のステージになるんだよ──────
trans:
Me and Mikoto's performance is gonna be the best
thing anyone has ever seen─────!

name: 美琴
text: ……できないって言いにきたの？
trans: ...Did you come here to tell me you can't do it?

name: 美琴
text:
できないなら、
構成を変えなきゃいけないけど
trans:
If you can't, then we'll need to start considering
alternatives.

name: にちか
trans:
...To say that...
...That, I'm not able to───

name: プロデューサー
text: …………あれ、開いてるな
trans: ...Huh, this door is open.

name: にちか
trans:
───────
Y-you're right. I'm not...

name: プロデューサー
text:
…………
にちかだ
trans: ...It's Nichika.

name: ルカ
text: 美琴、やらなきゃ──────！
trans: Mikoto, we have to do this─────!

name: にちか
text:
──────
できないって……言いにきました……
trans:
I came here... to tell you that I'm not going to be
able to do it...

name: にちか
text:
……このまま…………
このままやって…………失敗して…………
trans:
...At the rate things are going... I'd be so completely
unprepared... and if we were to fail because of that...

name: にちか
text: …………すごい
trans: ...She's incredible.

name: お笑い
text: 共演者だからね？
trans: We're co-stars, yeah?

name: にちか
text:
…………美琴さんのダンス、わ……私が…………
……ダメにする……………って、いうのは………………
trans:
...I'll just end up... ruining your dancing... with all my
screws-ups, Mikoto-san...

name: ルカ
text:
美琴を見せなきゃダメなんだよ…………ッ
私のせいでやれないとか、意味ないんだよ………………！
trans:
Everyone needs to see Mikoto's performance...
There's no point to not letting Mikoto do it just
because of me...!

name: 美琴
text:
……ステージに立って
自分がいいものを見せられるかどうか
trans:
...It's a matter of whether or not you can get up on
stage, and show something that you're proud of,
or not.

name: 美琴
text: それだけだと思う
trans: I don't think there's anything else to it.

name: 美琴
text:
できないなら、
それで仕方ないんじゃない
trans:
If you aren't able to do that, then that's too bad,
but that's how it goes.

name: にちか
text:
…………申し訳……ありません…………
失礼しました………………！
trans:
I'm so... terribly sorry...
I'll leave you alone now...!

name: 美琴
trans: Ah...

name: プロデューサー
trans: ────P-pardon me...

text:
そうとも……
限らないんじゃないか
trans:
Maybe things...
Don't have to
end like this?

text:
……ちょっと
待ってくれないか
trans:
...Would you both
mind waiting
just a moment?

text: ……失礼するよ
trans:
...Sorry to
interrupt.

name: 美琴
text:
プロデューサーも……
どうしたの
trans:
Now you're here too, Producer... 
What's going on?

name: プロデューサー
text:
……悪い、勝手に
ドアが開いてて、声が聞こえたから────
trans:
...Sorry for barging in. It's just, the door was open,
and I could hear your voices from outside───

name: にちか
text: ぷ……プロデューサーさん……
trans: P-producer-san...

name: プロデューサー
text:
……電話には出てくれたら嬉しいよ
悪い。ドアが開いてて、声が聞こえたから────
trans:
...I'd appreciate it if you would answer your phone.
Sorry for barging in. It's just, the door was open, and
I could hear your voices from outside───

name: にちか＆美琴
text: プロデューサー──────
trans: Producer──────

name: プロデューサー
text:
急にごめんな。話を遮りたくなくて
ドアが開いてて、声が聞こえてくるから────
trans:
Sorry, I know this is sudden. I don't want to
interrupt. It's just, the door was open, and I could
hear your voices from outside───

name: プロデューサー
text:
ここにふたりがいるんじゃないかって気がして来たんだ
……話をさせてもらってもいいか？
trans:
I came over this way because I'd had a hunch that
the two of you might be here.
...Do you mind if I talk to you both a little?

name: にちか
trans:
...Guh.
I was already, about to lea────

name: 美琴
text:
……
入ったら
trans: ...Come in, if you want.

name: 社長
text: ────なんとも不似合いな蔵書だな
trans: ───These books aren't your usual fare.

name: 社長
text:
……『現代舞踏入門』『20世紀の名演』
『音源付き！　早わかり現代音楽』──────
trans:
..."An Introduction to Modern Dance", "Legendary
Performances of the 20th Century", "CD Included!
An Easy Guide to Contemporary Music"───

name: プロデューサー
text:
……その、やれるやれないっていうのは……精神論じゃない
────美琴が言ってるのは、そういうことだよな
trans:
...Whether you can or cannot do something isn't any
sort of reflection on your character, Nichika.
────That's what Mikoto is trying to say.

name: 美琴
text: ……やれるかどうかということ
trans: ...It's simply a matter of whether or not you're able.

name: プロデューサー
text:
うん。舞台の上できっちりパフォーマンスを見せられるか
…………それだったら
trans:
Yeah. It's only a question of whether or not you can
go on stage and perform adequately...
So, with that being said───

name: プロデューサー
text:
できるパフォーマンスしか
しなければいいと思う
trans:
I don't think it makes sense to attempt a
performance that is outside your current
capabilities.

name: プロデューサー
text: 踊るのをやめるんだ、にちか
trans:
Nichika, I think you should give up on trying to
dance at FanFest altogether.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……舞踏用の音楽さ、声を重ねるだけって案が出てたよな
『あー』っていう……
trans:
...I remember an idea was proposed about using only
vocals for the music that will accompany the dance
performance. Someone singing "Ahhh", right...

name: 美琴
text:
……その場で重ねていってループさせるの
いい案だと思ってる
trans:
...Then we would loop those vocals and layer them.
I thought it was a great idea.

name: プロデューサー
text:
うん……
そしたら、にちかはそれに専念できないか？
trans:
Yeah... Nichika, do you think you could take over that
role, instead?

name: にちか
text:
────────！
『あー』って声だけ出してろって……ことですか…………！
trans:
──────!
Are you seriously saying... That I should go up there
and just sing "Ahhh" the entire performance...!

name: にちか
text:
だから私、やめるって言ってるじゃないですか……！
そん……そんなに私──────！
trans:
Look, I already said I was quitting, didn't I...!
Y-you're really going to have me──────!

name: プロデューサー
text:
『そんなに私使えないですかね』
……って言う前に、何を大事にしたいのか考えてほしい
trans:
Before you say "do next to nothing"... I want you to
consider what is most important to you about this
performance. What you want to prioritize.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……美琴もだ
やめていいのか、ほんとに
trans:
...The same goes for you, Mikoto.
I want you to think long and hard about whether or
not you should still stick with your original plan.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……もちろん次の機会もあるかもしれないし、
ふたりがスキルアップしてから再挑戦って考え方もある
trans:
...There may be a chance to try contemporary dance
again in the future. It may be better to wait until
both of you have improved your skills, too.

name: プロデューサー
text:
けど、今は一回しかない
……本当にまたこういう機会が巡ってくるとは限らないよ
trans:
However, FanFest is a one-time event.
...There's no guarantee that there will ever be
another opportunity like this.

name: 美琴
text: ……何を大事に
trans: ...What I want to prioritize.

name: プロデューサー
text:
そうだ。あくまでふたりに理想があるならやめるのもいい
……でも何を一番大事にしたいのか、よく考えてほしい
trans:
That's right. If you have any doubts, feel free to pull
things back... But I really do want you both to decide
what is most important to you here.

name: プロデューサー
text: ──────俺はそれを大事にする
trans: ──Because, I plan to make your priorities, my priority.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……『感謝祭』なんだ
感謝できるといいなと思うよ……
trans:
...FanFest is an event about gratitude, after all.
I think it would be best if you were both able to feel
grateful...

name: プロデューサー
text: 今っていう時間にも
trans: Even for this time you have right now.

name: ルカ
trans: Aaaaa....!

name: ルカ
trans: ─────I'd wanted to do it, so badly.
